title: Luxury House for Sale In Thalawatugoda
location: Mill Gaha Watta Hokandara Road, Thalawathugoda
details:
This is a Spacious 5 Bed Room house with attached Bath Rooms with Luxury Fittings. in Thalawatugoda This house has Natural Timber flooring and Titanium Cement floors.This has a modern Pantry and Kitchen,
This will also have Solar Power with net Metering System and CCTV..There is a Covered Garage for 3 Vehicles and Dedicated space for a 20 FT x 10 Ft swimming Pool either in the rear or front of the House.
A Roof top pavilion for 60 pax and Separate quarters for driver and Maid is also available
A completed master piece can be viewed by prior appointment.
This House is under construction and the Completion Date is May 2018.
The Payment can be arranged on installment basis ,with an initial payment of 30% and the balance spread over 12 months.
Please make an appoint for inspection and more information.
